story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I fail to understand your intent here.
Explain in more detail.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We think someone’s trying to use Arceus’s
power for evil.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
So if that happens, we’ll need you and your
partner Pokémon, Palkia, to lend us your
strength.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0600_10: Lucas has Dialga, and Cynthia has Giratina...
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
If all three Pokémon work together, we can
hold our ground, even if we have to battle
Arceus!
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Why are you even worried that could
happen?
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Are you implying someone’s trying to make
Arceus theirs?
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1200_10: We saw some movement from Team Rocket.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Given their goals, we suspect their next
target is Arceus.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Should I consider that information a tip-off
from the International Police?
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I suppose that does sound like something
they’d think of.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You might already know that Arceus is said
to be the creator of all things.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Even in Hisui, I knew someone who thought
of using Arceus’s power to create their ideal
world.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2000_10: That’s why we need your help!
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
I understand the situation, but that’s not
reason enough for me to team up with you.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2300_10:
If their aim is to control Arceus to recreate
the world into something complete...
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2400_10: then we have the same desire.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2500_10:
And that would oppose your philosophy,
as you do not wish Arceus used in such
a way.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Hold on a sec. Cyrus, if you also want to get
ahold of Arceus’s power...
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_2800_10:
then even more so, you’d want to stop
Arceus from falling into others’ hands.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Even if Team Rocket is on the move again,
Team Galactic is well equipped to handle
them on our own.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3100_10:
There’s no need to risk showing our hand to
someone we may oppose in the future.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3200_10: I am done with this discussion.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3400_10: Thanks for hearing us out, Cyrus.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3700_10:
Nice to meet you. You must be Cyrus, the
boss of Team Galactic.
story_arceus_06_05000/2401_1001_3800_10: Could I bother you for a bit of your time?
